PAD_ViconiaWolf.synopsis: Shadowheart reacts to Viconia turning into a wolf during the combat.
PAD_ViconiaWolf.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the Sharran Grotto2. Bring Shadowheart3. Engage Viconia4. Get in combat5. Wait until Viconia turns into a wolf.

FindsPlayerStealingBox.synopsis: Shadowheart reacts to the player trying to steal the mysterious gith artefact.
FindsPlayerStealingBox.how_to_trigger: Applicable when SH is unrecruited, or when she's recruited but not in the party (ie sent to camp). Not applicable during Shadowheart_Recruitment_Beach (handled differently there).

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune altars and shrines
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar.how_to_trigger: Enter a Selunite place with a shrine or altar that doesn't have custom reactivity already.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune writings such as books, scrolls and documents.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book.how_to_trigger: Finish reading a writing regarding Selune that doesn't have a custom reaction

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune locations that aren't specifically shrines or altars. Such as corpses of Selunites and the Selunite outpost in the Underdark.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc.how_to_trigger: Enter a Selunite place that isn't a shrine or altar that doesn't have custom reactivity already.

PAD_WolfFearReflection.synopsis: Shadowheart is afraid of wolves due her belief that she was being chased by one in her childhood. Should this be revealed to the party after it was triggered, or if Shadowheart by herself she will further relect on it.
PAD_WolfFearReflection.how_to_trigger: 1. Get close to a hostile wolf on Shadowheart2. Finish combat and wait for VB to play.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune items such as amulets, idols, earrings and weapons
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item.how_to_trigger: Loot a Selunite item that doesn't have custom reactivity or isn't a book.

WolfDream.synopsis: Shadowheart's wolf dream in which she dreams of a wolf chasing her and Viconia saving her.
WolfDream.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Shadowheart -> Wolf Dream

PAD_WoundFlareUp.synopsis: Shadowheart's incurable wound flares up during gameplay. Forcing her in a great deal of pain. Has variations for Enemy of Shar path and pre-Enemy of Shar.
PAD_WoundFlareUp.how_to_trigger: 1. Fail a trial in the Shar Temple.

PAD_WolfFear.synopsis: Shadowheart is afraid of wolves due her belief that she was being chased by one in her childhood. When this fear is triggered by a wolf,
PAD_WolfFear.how_to_trigger: 1. Plays when Shadowheart is close to a wolf and she is still afraid of wolves.

AD_SuccessfulCombat.synopsis: After surviving their first combat fighting side by side, Shadowheart compliments the player's skill.

PAD_ViconiaWolf_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ViconiaWolf_0.text: I'm not afraid of wolves any more - spare me your cheap tricks!
PAD_ViconiaWolf_0.context: NodeContext: Angry/in combat - Viconia has turned into a wolf to provoke Shadowheart's phobia, but knowing the truth (that a wolf she encountered as a child was her father) she is no longer afraid.

PAD_ViconiaWolf_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ViconiaWolf_1.context: NodeContext: Fearful/in combat. Reacting to viconia using her phobia of wolves against her by turning herself and her minions into them durinng combat.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_1.speaker: Shadowheart
FindsPlayerStealingBox_1.text: Do that again, and I'll kill you. That's your one and only warning - understand?

FindsPlayerStealingBox_5.speaker: Shadowheart
FindsPlayerStealingBox_5.text: Good. Don't test me on this - I'm deadly serious.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_0.speaker: Player
FindsPlayerStealingBox_0.text: Don't be so dramatic. It was an innocent mistake, that's all.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_2.speaker: Shadowheart
FindsPlayerStealingBox_2.text: You don't get to decide that. Keep your hands to yourself.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_6.speaker: Player
FindsPlayerStealingBox_6.text: Save your threats and hand over the artefact.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_4.speaker: Shadowheart
FindsPlayerStealingBox_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Hostile after this node.NodeContext: Resolve. Combat after this line.

FindsPlayerStealingBox_3.speaker: Shadowheart
FindsPlayerStealingBox_3.text: You should've kept your hands to yourself.
FindsPlayerStealingBox_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Hasmet. Hostile after this node (player was warned previously)

Intro_3.text: My name is Shadowheart, loyal servant of Shar, goddess of darkness and loss. There is little more I can tell you than that.

Intro_0.text: My Lady Shar tasked me with a mission of such secrecy that I surrendered great swathes of my memory in order to safeguard the knowledge of it.

Intro_2.text: All I know is that I must bring the artefact I hold to Baldur's Gate, and that nothing can stand in my way.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_0.text: Strange... I would have been compelled to defile this shrine once. But no longer.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_0.context: NodeContext: On looking at a Selune altar. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_1.text: Dedicated to Selûne. A place where fools kneel, then.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_1.context: NodeContext: Derisive. On seeing a Selune shrine or altar (Arc: SH remains loyal to Shar).

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_2.context: NodeContext: Derisive. On seeing a Selune shrine or altar (Arc: SH remains loyal to Shar).

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_3.text: Selûne... had life turned out differently, I might have been kneeling in prayer here.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_3.context: NodeContext: On looking at a Selune altar. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_4.text: I don't know what I'm supposed to feel about Selûne now. I was fed lies for so long...
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_4.context: NodeContext: On looking at a Selune altar. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_5.text: Dedicated to the moonwitch - no - moonmaiden. She is not the enemy.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_5.context: NodeContext: On looking at a Selune altar. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_6.text: It must take a truly feeble mind to raise such a dedication to Selûne.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_6.context: NodeContext: Derisive. On seeing a Selune shrine or altar (Arc: SH remains loyal to Shar).

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Altar_7.context: NodeContext: Derisive. On seeing a Selune shrine or altar (Arc: SH remains loyal to Shar).

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_0.text: It would have been heresy to even consider reading this, once. No more.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_0.context: NodeContext: On looking at a book related to Selune. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_1.text: A Selûnite book. Fit only for the pyre.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_1.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to a book related to Selune. Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_2.text: Imagine wasting your time actually reading this tripe.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_2.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to a book related to Selune. Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_3.text: Selûnite. I would have burned this, once.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_3.context: NodeContext: On looking at a book related to Selune. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_4.text: Curious, seeing a book of Selûne and not wanting to immediately rip it up...
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_4.context: NodeContext: On looking at a book related to Selune. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_5.text: A Selûnite book. Perhaps I should actually heed her words, for a change.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_5.context: NodeContext: On looking at a book related to Selune. Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_6.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to a book related to Selune. Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_7.text: A Selûnite book. I'm almost surprised that lot can read, never mind write.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Book_7.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to a book related to Selune. Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_0.text: Was anything I was taught about Selûne true...?
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_0.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_1.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_2.text: Of the moonwitch. Ought to be burned.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_2.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_3.text: Selûnite. Strange... once, I would have been repelled. Now, I don't know.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_3.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_4.text: Selûnite. Once my enemy, now the enemy of my enemy...
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_4.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_5.text: Sometimes I still catch myself scoffing at anything Selûnite... old habits die hard.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_5.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_6.text: Selûne worship... imagine being so desperate as to turn to her.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_6.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_7.text: Selûnite. An offence to the eyes.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Misc_7.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_WolfFearReflection_1.speaker: Player
PAD_WolfFearReflection_1.text: I didn't realise you were frightened of wolves, Shadowheart.

PAD_WolfFearReflection_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFearReflection_0.text: Everyone's frightened of something. My fear's hardly irrational, when you see the fangs on those things.
PAD_WolfFearReflection_0.context: NodeContext: A little shaken after an encounter with a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia) Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_WolfFearReflection_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFearReflection_2.text: Blasted wolves. They always make me feel like that scared little girl all over again...
PAD_WolfFearReflection_2.context: NodeContext: A little shaken after an encounter with a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia) Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_0.text: Selûnite. Strange, seeing  such an item in a new light.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_0.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_1.text: Selûne. Fit only for a rubbish pile.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_1.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_2.text: Moonwitch rubbish. Ought to be burned.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_2.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_3.text: Selûnite. I would have looked on this with scorn, once...
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_3.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_4.text: Strange. I would have scoffed at such a thing, once.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_4.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_5.text: I would have destroyed this in Shar's name once. But no longer.
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_5.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_6.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneReactivity_Item_7.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

WolfDream_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The shape of a large wolf steps out from the treeline and into the moonlight. It closes on young Shadowheart, unhurried.

WolfDream_21.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Young Shadowheart backs up, but there's nowhere to go.

On the wolf, advancing. It stares intently at the child -

WolfDream_17.context:
CinematicNodeContext: - then its eyeline shifts slightly to something behind her. It snarls intensely. Shadowheart keeps backing away - 

- backing right into a MASKED FIGURE in dark clothing who has silently appeared behind her. She spins, startled.

WolfDream_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wolf backs up, threatened, as more MASKED FIGURES appear, flanking it. They are armed. The wolf is outnumbered.

WolfDream_16.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is unable to look away. The first masked figure steps in front of her and crouches down to her level.

Camera holds on Shadowheart, with the rear of the figure only glimpsed from the corner of the frame.

WolfDream_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart tries to peer beyond the figure. Offscreen, we hear the wolf's snarling give way to a yelp/howl of pain... that sounds curiously human

WolfDream_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Young SH's POV: the wolf has transformed into an elf man. On the ground, wounded and surrounded by masked, cloaked figures. He reaches out towards the child desperately, crying out something unheard. A masked figure steps forward, back to camera and arm raised. They strike the elf (blow unseen).InternalNodeContext: THIS NODE ONLY FOR THE FULL SCENE

WolfDream_8.context: NodeContext: The figure reaches up to remove their mask. Shadowheart looks at them, wide-eyed.

WolfDream_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure stands and guides Shadowheart away. What seemed paternal and protective before now reads like a stranger making off with a scared and confused child

WolfDream_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: On black: the sounds of frantic running through undergrowth, and a young girl's panicked, breathless panting. Suddenly an alarmed cry, and we head someone taking a tumble.

WolfDream_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: We fade in on a forest clearing, on a moonlit night. A young half-elf girl pushing her off the forest floor, groaning. She looks around, fearful. SHADOWHEART, maybe eight years old. Black hair pulled back from her face. Across her cheek and the bridge of her nose a branch has opened up a fresh cut. She raises her hand to it with a wince.

WolfDream_5.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Somewhere nearby, an eerie howl. Shadowheart stares, wide-eyed.

The shape of a large wolf steps out from the treeline and into the moonlight. It closes on Shadowheart, unhurried.

WolfDream_15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She backs up, but there's nowhere to go.

On the wolf, advancing. It stares intently at the child -

WolfDream_18.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The wolf snarls intensely, seemingly at Shadowheart (but in fact at  someone behind her). Shadowheart keeps backing away - 

- backing right into a MASKED FIGURE in dark clothing who has silently appeared behind her. She spins, startled.

WolfDream_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wolf backs up, threatened, as more MASKED FIGURES appear, flanking it. They are armed. The wolf is outnumbered.

WolfDream_1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is unable to look away. The first masked figure steps in front of her and crouches down to her level.

Camera holds on Shadowheart, with the rear of the figure only glimpsed from the corner of the frame.

WolfDream_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart tries to peer beyond the figure. Offscreen, we hear the wolf's snarling give way to a yelp/howl of pain.

WolfDream_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure reaches up to remove their mask. Shadowheart looks at them, wide-eyed.

WolfDream_9.speaker: Narrator
WolfDream_9.text: *Before Lady Shar, you were nothing. An orphan who could not forget the howl of wolves. She saved your life. She gave you a family.*
WolfDream_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure stands and guides Shadowheart away, seemingly with paternal, protective body language.

WolfDream_0.speaker: Shadowheart
WolfDream_0.text: She asked me my name. I can't remember what I said. I can't remember anything before those woods. All I know is she saved my life, and gave me a new home. With Lady Shar.

WolfDream_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure stands and guides Shadowheart away, seemingly with paternal, protective body language.

PAD_WoundFlareUp_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_0.context: NodeContext: Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. (default reaction - doesn't quite know why this is happening, but supposes it may be for disciplinary purposes for anti-shar behaviour)

PAD_WoundFlareUp_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_1.text: Ngh... hells, she's just hurting me out of spite.
PAD_WoundFlareUp_1.context: NodeContext: Discomfort/frustration. Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. Here, she has already abandoned the goddess shar, and is aware that Shar is basically tormenting her, not trying to discipline or guide her with pain.

PAD_WoundFlareUp_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_2.text: Agh... she can't keep doing this.
PAD_WoundFlareUp_2.context: NodeContext: Discomfort/frustration. Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. Here, she has already abandoned the goddess shar, and is aware that Shar is basically tormenting her, not trying to discipline or guide her with pain.

PAD_WoundFlareUp_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_3.text: Ngh... are the gods truly this petty...?
PAD_WoundFlareUp_3.context: NodeContext: Discomfort/frustration. Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. Here, she has already abandoned the goddess shar, and is aware that Shar is basically tormenting her, not trying to discipline or guide her with pain.

PAD_WoundFlareUp_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_4.context: NodeContext: Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. (default reaction - doesn't quite know why this is happening, but supposes it may be for disciplinary purposes for anti-shar behaviour)

PAD_WoundFlareUp_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_5.text: Agh... I never get used to it.

PAD_WoundFlareUp_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_6.context: NodeContext: Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. (default reaction - doesn't quite know why this is happening, but supposes it may be for disciplinary purposes for anti-shar behaviour)

PAD_WoundFlareUp_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WoundFlareUp_7.text: Agh... she's still intent on hurting me.
PAD_WoundFlareUp_7.context: NodeContext: Discomfort/frustration. Suffering a burst of pain inflicted by her incurable wound. Here, she has already abandoned the goddess shar, and is aware that Shar is basically tormenting her, not trying to discipline or guide her with pain.

PAD_WolfFear_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFear_0.context: NodeContext: Fearful. Reacting to a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia). Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_WolfFear_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFear_1.context: NodeContext: Fearful. Reacting to a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia). Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_WolfFear_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFear_2.context: NodeContext: Fearful. Reacting to a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia). Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_WolfFear_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_WolfFear_3.context: NodeContext: Fearful. Reacting to a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia). Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

AD_SuccessfulCombat_0.speaker: Shadowheart
AD_SuccessfulCombat_0.text: You fight well. Perhaps our survival isn't such a distant prospect.
